cards.title: Random Quote Generator
cards.subtitle: Javascript, HTML5, CSS3
cards.text: A simple JavaScript program that generates a random quote on a button click, or after a short time delay.

cards.title: List Pagination and Filtering App.
cards.subtitle: Javascript, HTML5, CSS3
cards.text: An app to paginate a list of 54 student records such that 10 are displayed per page, and pagination links are appended dynamically to the bottom of the page. Also includes a facility to search for a specific record, using the 'keyup' method to update search results in real time.

cards.title: Interactive Form
cards.subtitle: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Regular Expressions
cards.text: An interactive form for retrieving and validating information entered by users, built using vanilla JS, jQuery and regular expressions.

cards.title: Word Guessing Game
cards.subtitle: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Object-Oriented Programming
cards.text: A 'Hangman'-style game in which the player has to guess the letters in a phrase, for which placeholders are displayed on-screen.

cards.title: Public API Request
cards.subtitle: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, API Request
cards.text: Make a public API request to retrieve data on 12 employes, before formatting and displaying employee information.

cards.title: Snooker Score Calculator
cards.subtitle: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery
cards.text: A single-page snooker score calculator which enables players to record their score for the current frame, and frames/ matches won

cards.title: Darts Score Calculator
cards.subtitle: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery
cards.text: A single-page darts score calculator which enables players to records their score for the current leg and the number of legs won

cards.title: React Gallery App.
cards.subtitle: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, React, Axios
cards.text: A photo gallery app. built using React which retrieves data using Axios via a Flickr API.

cards.title: Guess the Rickyism
cards.subtitle: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Object-Oriented Programming
cards.text: A hangman-style word-guessing game involving the malapropisms and mispronunciations of the Trailer Park Boys character Ricky.

cards.title: SQL Library Manager
subtitle: JavaScript
HTML5
CSS3
Express
Pug
Sequelize
cards.text: An app. built using Express, Pug and Sequelize which enables users to create, read, update and delete book entries in a library database.
